Title: The Fixer
Writer: John Ridley, Reg Watson (creator), Lara Radulovich (creator)
Actors: Danielle Cormack, Nicole da Silva, Kate Atkinson, Celia Ireland
Plot: When Ferguson discovers Doreen is the pregnant prisoner, the Governor threatens to have Nash's parole revoked unless she lies about the father. Will is publicly accused of an inappropriate relationship with Bea.
